name: Earthquake Warning
description:
Oh no, an earthquake is about to hit your generic school location! Do you have the calm mind and quick wits to make it through this situation unscathed?
Featuring:

  • Three endings, two of which are the same!
  • Incredible point-and-click action!
  • Press F4 to toggle fullscreen!
  • A title card that has the wrong name written on it!

Made across the course of a single day for LÖVE Jam 2022, mainly to prove that I could do it.

Font used is Golden Apple with the line spacing reduced.
